Compensation to Victims of Japan's Forcible Drafting Demanded in S. Korea 
   Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Korean victims of forcible drafting perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists reportedly called a press conference in front of the head office of the stock company of the Mitsubishi Heavy Industry Co. in Seoul on August 18 to demand Japan's full compensation.
 At the conference speakers said that adequate compensation has not been made to the victims of forcible drafting, declaring they would carry on their sit-in strike everyday till Japan has compensated for the damage done to Koreans.    
 A press release read out at the conference noted that if Japan persistently evades its responsibility, paying no heed to the pain suffered by the victims of the forcible drafting, the stock company has to quit this land at once.

Congratulations to President of Sao Tome and Principe
   Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Frederique de Menezes upon his reelection as president of Sao Tome and Principe.
 The message sincerely wished the president greater success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country, expressing the belief that the relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

DPRK Will Bolster War Deterrent with Utmost Efforts: KPA General Staff Chief
   Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- We will keenly watch the moves of the United States and its followers including Japan to stifle the DPRK with sharp vigilance and do our utmost to bolster our self-defensive war deterrent, unhindered by anything, tightly holding the revolutionary banner of Songun, thus adding shine to the ever-victorious history of the Korean revolution covering centuries, declared Kim Yong Chun, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.
 He was delivering a report at a national meeting commemorating the 46th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.    
 The situation on the Korean Peninsula, he said, which is getting more serious due to the dastardly and malicious hostile policy of the United States clearly proves how judicious it is that we have built up stalwart self-defensive war deterrent by carrying through all along the principle of Songun, while adhering to the unshakable stand that the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation can be defended only when we have great strength.

Gift and Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift and floral basket by the Japan-DPRK friendship delegation on a visit to the DPRK.
 They were handed to an official concerned on Thursday by Toshikazu Suzuki, chairperson of the Shizuoka Society for the Study of the Juche Idea who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ukrainian President
   Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Viktor Yusenko, president of Ukraine, on Aug. 24 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of its national holiday.
 The message sincerely wished the Ukrainian president great success in his responsible work as well as the Ukrainian people stability, prosperity and well-being.
